title: From Nobody to No Bodies
itunes:title: From Nobody to No Bodies
description:
WED 8/3 - All-purpose activist and journalist Marc Lamont Hill stops by The Breakfast Club to discuss community and world events, meshing pop culture & conscious, and his new book "Nobody", which addresses the plight of bodies dropped in the urban community. Donkey of the Day goes to a lady with a body who blames a body on the wrong person. Did we lose you? Come back please.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
